channel.title: Pest control [portals respawn] [pi]
channel.description: How do i stop portals from re-spawning?

item.title: Pest control [portals respawn] [pi]
item.dc:creator: @youda_fucking_best youda fucking best
item.description:
@youda_fucking_best wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:5, topic:413612”]they should be spawned at the start of the minigame like this

public void spawnNpcs() { Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc2(6142,2628,2591,0,0,200,0,0,100); Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc2(6143,2680,2588,0,0,200,0,0,100); Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc2(6144,2669,2570,0,0,200,0,0,100); Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc2(6145,2645,2569,0,0,200,0,0,100); }

thats the code i have, but they re-spawn still.

that would make them only spawn once until the method is called again (e.g at the start of the minigame)[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Pest control [portals respawn] [pi]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

they should be spawned at the start of the minigame like this

public void spawnNpcs() { Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc2(6142,2628,2591,0,0,200,0,0,100); Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc2(6143,2680,2588,0,0,200,0,0,100); Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc2(6144,2669,2570,0,0,200,0,0,100); Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc2(6145,2645,2569,0,0,200,0,0,100); }

that would make them only spawn once until the method is called again (e.g at the start of the minigame)

Read full topic
